titlStmt.titl: Press articles on statewide mask orders in 33 US states

citation.biblCit: Jacobs, Philip, 2020, "Press articles on statewide mask orders in 33 US states", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/SFIT0R, UAL Dataverse, V1

titlStmt.titl: Press articles on statewide mask orders in 33 US states

stdyInfo.abstract: This bibliographical data base containts references from US press articles. The topic is governors' orders in 33 states for wearing masks to reduce the spread of COVID-19. The newspaper articles describe details of the orders and identify who enforces these orders and whether these enforcers had expressed reservations about their roles.

citation.biblCit: The enforcement of statewide mask wearing mandates to prevent COVID-19 in the US: an overview
